Package InputBoundary

Interface AddPurchaseBoundaryIn

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddPurchase
public interface AddPurchaseBoundaryIn

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UpdatedLists
    executeUseCase(PurchaseInfo purchaseInfo)
    Removes the item being purchased from the planning list and assigns the buyer, price, and users involved in the purchase to the item entity object then adds it to the purchased list of the group, saves the new group information to the database, then returns the new lists to be displayed to the view

  • Method Details

    • executeUseCase

      UpdatedLists executeUseCase(PurchaseInfo purchaseInfo)
      Removes the item being purchased from the planning list and assigns the buyer, price, and users involved in the purchase to the item entity object then adds it to the purchased list of the group, saves the new group information to the database, then returns the new lists to be displayed to the view
      Parameters:
      purchaseInfo - the data structure containing all the information required to make a purchase and update the necessary data
      Returns:
      the information sent back by the presenter through the use case to go to the view layer as an updated lists object
